Nightshift shakes his head to try and gather his wits and then scoots quick=
ly behind Polarclaw .  He knew it was not a good time to attempt another at=
tack.

" Saved by the bear.  Can't get any better than this.  Thanks buddy =
I owe ya one. "



Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for=
 things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.=


On Dec 3, 2011, at 5:13 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrot=
e:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift gasps and out of reflex, he springs into t=
he air toward the queen
> > in an attempt to distract her.
> >
> > " Don't =
even go there, ya ugly bug! Batscout, move it! Get outa here!"
> 
> <NEW>
>=
 
> The QUEEN continued to cackle, her four bladed arms held out in the
> a=
ir like some sort of misshapen Preying Mantis her wings flaring out
> behin=
d her as the wind continued to pick up.
> 
> She looked down to see her two=
 drones, the same ones that had led
> BATSCOUT and NIGHTSHIFT to this very =
room leap to intercept NIGHTSHIFT
> as he leaped, their bodies colliding wi=
th his!
> 
> "You are a brave species!' The QUEEN said, her insectiod featu=
res
> managing to curve into something akin to a smile. "Foolish, but brave=

> none the less."
> 
> Then lightning struck! Once, and then again! and th=
e energy was
> siphoned into the growing energy that was building in the hi=
ve-like
> structure in the center of the room. Even the QUEEN was beginning=
 to
> glow!
> 
> POLAR CLAW, followed by WOLFGANG and RAMULUS stepped aroun=
d the corner
> to face the QUEEN. At the same time BATSCOUT flew at POLAR C=
LAW
> transforming into one of his shoulder mounted cannons!
> 
> "Shut thi=
s . . . what ever it is off!" POLAR CLAW said, his powerful
> voice rising =
above the sound of the wind and storm that was filling
> the room. He point=
ed his weapons at the QUEEN as did the others with
> him.
> 
> The QUEEN ju=
st cackled madly as the lightning struck again, the stream
> of energy hitt=
ing the Hive, causing it and the queen to glow brighter.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - =
Preston
>

<html><head></head><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift shakes his hea=
d to try and gather his wits and then scoots quickly behind Polarclaw . &nb=
sp;He knew it was not a good time to attempt another attack.</div><div><br>=
</div><div>" Saved by the bear.  Can't get any better than this. &nbsp=
;Thanks buddy I owe ya one. "</div><div><br></div><div><br><br>Don't be env=
ious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses. &nb=
sp;Nothing is worth more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Dec 3, 2=
011, at 5:13 PM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@gmail.c=
om">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockqu=
ote type=3D"cite"><div>

    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>> <OLD>=
<br>
><br>
> Nightshift gasps and out of reflex, he springs into the =
air toward the queen<br>
> in an attempt to distract her.<br>
><br>
&=
gt; " Don't even go there, ya ugly bug!  Batscout, move it!  Get outa here!=
"<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
The QUEEN continued to cackle, her four bla=
ded arms held out in the<br>
air like some sort of misshapen Preying Mantis=
 her wings flaring out<br>
behind her as the wind continued to pick up.<br>=

<br>
She looked down to see her two drones, the same ones that had led<br>=

BATSCOUT and NIGHTSHIFT to this very room leap to intercept NIGHTSHIFT<br>=

as he leaped, their bodies colliding with his!<br>
<br>
"You are a brave s=
pecies!' The QUEEN said, her insectiod features<br>
managing to curve into =
something akin to a smile. "Foolish, but brave<br>
none the less."<br>
<br>=

Then lightning struck! Once, and then again! and the energy was<br>
siphon=
ed into the growing energy that was building in the hive-like<br>
structure=
 in the center of the room. Even the QUEEN was beginning to<br>
glow!<br>
<=
br>
POLAR CLAW, followed by WOLFGANG and RAMULUS stepped around the corner<=
br>
to face the QUEEN. At the same time BATSCOUT flew at POLAR CLAW<br>
tra=
nsforming into one of his shoulder mounted cannons!<br>
<br>
"Shut this . .=
 . what ever it is off!" POLAR CLAW said, his powerful<br>
voice rising abo=
ve the sound of the wind and storm that was filling<br>
the room. He pointe=
d his weapons at the QUEEN as did the others with<br>
him.<br>
<br>
The QUE=
EN just cackled madly as the lightning struck again, the stream<br>
of ener=
gy hitting the Hive, causing it and the queen to glow brighter.<br>
<br>
(T=
AG)<br>
<br>
- Preston<br>
</p>
